attributes.action: Allow All Police Forces To Have A Police Cadet Unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a teenager, who wants to go into the police when I have finished sixth form I would like an insight into the police. I’m lucky to live in an area where my police force has a cadet unit. But I have talked to quite a few teenagers who would love this insight into the police but they can’t as there police force doesn’t have a cadet scheme. If forces had these it would make relations with teenagers and police stronger.
